Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.sm_project_3.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
Database where various accounts will be stored.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Method to withdraw from an account. Note: The provided code seems to suggest the 'Account' object passed to the withdraw function contains the withdrawal amount as its balance. This seems a bit non-intuitive. You might want to reconsider this design.
      Parameters:
      account - The account from which to withdraw.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit(Account account)
      Method to deposit into an account. Note: Similar note as for withdraw, the design seems a bit non-intuitive.
      Parameters:
      account - The account into which to deposit.
      Returns:
